SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.OCR_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS OCR_DTM ,A.VHC_ID ,A.ROUT_ID ,A.OPER_APPR_ID ,D.ROUT_NM ,A.VHC_NO ,A.VHC_TYPE ,B.STTN_NM ,C.CRS_NM ,A.GPS_X ,A.GPS_Y ,A.OPER_APPR_STS ,A.OPER_APPR_DIV ,E.COMP_NM FROM BRT_OPER_APPR_INFO A LEFT JOIN BMS_STTN_MST B ON A.ADJ_STTN_ID = B.STTN_ID AND B.DEL_YN!='Y' LEFT JOIN BMS_CRS_MST C ON A.ADJ_CRS_ID = C.CRS_ID AND C.DEL_YN!='Y' LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST D ON A.ROUT_ID = D.ROUT_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_TRANSCOMP_MST E ON A.COMP_NM = E.COMP_ID
AND E.COMP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || D.ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND E.COMP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND A.VHC_TYPE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND D.ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND A.OCR_DTM BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{OCR_DTM}, '%Y-%m-%d 0:0:0') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{OCR_DTM}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
ORDER BY A.OCR_DTM
SELECT a.COMP_NM ,a.VHC_TYPE ,b.ROUT_NM FROM BRT_OPER_APPR_INFO a LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST b ON a.ROUT_ID = b.ROUT_ID
